statements: DELETE FROM luxury_partnerships WHERE partner_name = 'Example Company';
DELETE FROM luxury_partnerships WHERE partner_name = 'ABC Inc.' AND contact_person = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM gourmet_restaurant WHERE rating > 4.5 AND cuisine_type = 'French';
DELETE FROM luxury_car_rental WHERE car_id = 100 AND availability = FALSE;
DELETE FROM luxury_car_rental WHERE car_make = 'Mercedes' AND rental_price > 500.00;
DELETE FROM travel_partnerships WHERE partner_name = 'Travel World' AND business_type = 'Tourism';
DELETE FROM gourmet_restaurants WHERE restaurant_name = 'Le Jardin' AND cuisine_type = 'French';
